text: Love love love this place!!!! I love the cheeseburgers the best. Great ice cream, fries, ice tea and banana pudding
This place has changed hands from my last visit. The quality has gone way down. A simple vanilla soft serve cone was icy and granular with a very artificial taste. Won't be going back.

I've been hesitant to review this place due to being greedy but finally have to brake down and do it. Great milkshakes and ice cream but the real reason I come here is the chili cheese burger. The chili has a nice spice to it always fresh burgers served up quick. Not place to sit just a walk up window eat in your car. This place is a local favorite in derita and damn good place to grab a burger hot dog or milkshake
